unnormalised: Arre, Mr. Sharma, tem kitlench Bollywood-achem lagin asslem, nhoi mure? Smt. ani Shri Kapoor-an khorench bhari kel'lem. Mhaka aikunk mell'llem ki thollavo MLA, Mr. Patil-ui ailo! "Bhai" Khan-anui tannachi bori mhonnun dhaddli astoli kai mhunn dukhta. BTW, tuka Dr. Verma thoinch dislo? Chalo, boro vell aslolo soglleak!
